data.text: C) I also want to see characters deal with the ecological consequences of a world that has been burned up.

Some thoughts: 
*i would love to see this re-done/reimagined.
A) with a diverse cast (almost no POC exist in this dragon-laden post-apocalyptic word.)
B) in a limited series format where we can see the backstory that is only given in occasional exchanges of dialogue...
@Colten_Hibbs underrated movie in my opinion. I like the part where they tell the kids Star Wars.
